title: Pre Paid Card
body: So i got this 25 dollar prepaid card, and want to redeem it. I tried it like 3-4 times, and each time it said that the request couldnt be completed, and to wait. So i waited. After the last time, it said I attempted this to many times. All i want is to get the RP for riven, please help.

replies.body: Is this a $25 RP card or another prepaid card type? Also, is this happening in the Legacy Client or the Beta Client?
